hero.title: Hey, I'm Abay
hero.description: I've spent the last 3 years building some pretty cool software. I also play ping-pong and tennis (incase you've got spare time to playüèì). Let's connect!

about.title: About
description: Hey! I'm Abay, if you haven't understood that by now. I'm a Software Engineer in Hamburg, Germanyüßë‚Äçüíª. I specialize in the Full Stack, primarily Typescript, but love exploring new tools and technologies right for the job.

Currently, I am working in the company building software for social service on web and mobile, honing my skills developing features and contributions across the stack. I also learn new technologies and ways to create better solutions, going deeper into best practices and software design principles.
Outside of work, I play tennis with my friends, read booksüìó both code related and not, and watch TV shows.
I'm actively looking for new positions where I can prove my passion for engineering. If you think you've got an opening that I can fill, let's connect üîó

items.text: Currently working on developing and maintaining advanced SaaS application, focusing on building scalable, high-performance features using modern web technologies and ensuring a seamless user experience.

While working at DGSC, I architectured and build a frontend layer of access matrix platform, with dedicated client and admin dashboards, implementing real-time data updates of approval chains and automated deployment.

While working at DGSC, I have contributed to the development and maintenance of a comprehensive reporting platform used by multiple government entities. Working on both frontend and backend sides of the development.
